"Eddic": "Yeah, that's what I like to hear. I like your attitude."
"And hey, this is simple stuff, so don't sweat it."
"Basically, just try to form a party. Be like \"Looking for some folks to fight together!\" or whatever."
"If there's anyone in the mood, no doubt they'll join up with you."
"Hm? What if nobody wants to join you?"
"Hmm... Well, I'd say just wait and try again some other time. Everyone's got their own schedules, y'know?"
"And hey, don't let moments like that get to ya. Just go for it! Keep puttin' yourself out there."
